articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Record-breaking heat bakes US, Europe, China - World - DAWN.COM - DAWN.com
articles.description: Extreme weather “unfortunately becoming the new normal,” warns World Meteorological Organisation.
articles.content: Summer has just begun in the Northern Hemisphere but a brutal heat wave is already gripping parts of Europe, China and the United States, where record temperatures expected this weekend are a stark i… [+3827 chars]
